Description: This beautifully updated 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom home in Maplewood offers spacious living with modern finishes. The open-concept kitchen features granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a large island perfect for entertaining. A cozy fireplace anchors the living room, while the master suite includes a walk-in closet and spa-like bathroom. The backyard is fully fenced with a patio ideal for summer barbecues.
Neighborhood Description: Maplewood is a family-friendly neighborhood known for its tree-lined streets, excellent schools, and community events. Residents enjoy weekend farmers markets, local parks, and a variety of dining options within walking distance.

Description: This stunning 5-bedroom, 4-bathroom home in Brookside combines classic charm with modern upgrades. Featuring hardwood floors throughout, a chef’s kitchen with double ovens, and a finished basement with a home theater, this home is perfect for large families or entertaining guests. The landscaped backyard includes a pergola and fire pit.
Neighborhood Description: Brookside is a historic neighborhood with a vibrant arts scene, boutique shopping, and top-rated restaurants. Its walkable streets and proximity to downtown make it a favorite among professionals and families alike.

Description: Enjoy panoramic views in this 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom home perched in Sunset Hills. The open floor plan includes a gourmet kitchen, vaulted ceilings, and a sunroom that opens to a large deck. The master suite features a private balcony and luxurious en-suite bathroom.
Neighborhood Description: Sunset Hills is known for its scenic vistas, quiet streets, and upscale homes. Residents enjoy hiking trails, nearby wineries, and a peaceful suburban atmosphere just minutes from the city center.

Description: Charming 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom ranch-style home in Riverbend with a spacious backyard and updated kitchen. The home features a bright living room with bay windows, a formal dining area, and a two-car garage. Perfect for first-time buyers or those looking to downsize.
Neighborhood Description: Riverbend is a picturesque neighborhood along the river, offering walking trails, kayaking, and picnic areas. With a strong sense of community and excellent schools, it’s ideal for families and outdoor enthusiasts.

Description: This luxurious 4-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom home in Highland Park boasts high-end finishes, a gourmet kitchen with marble countertops, and a grand staircase. The master suite includes a fireplace, walk-in closet, and spa bathroom. The backyard features a pool and outdoor kitchen.
Neighborhood Description: Highland Park is an upscale neighborhood known for its stately homes, manicured lawns, and proximity to elite schools and country clubs. Residents enjoy a quiet, prestigious lifestyle with easy access to downtown.

Description: This cozy 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home in Willow Creek features a newly renovated kitchen, hardwood floors, and a large backyard with mature trees. The open living and dining area is perfect for gatherings, and the primary suite includes a private bath.
Neighborhood Description: Willow Creek is a peaceful suburban neighborhood with excellent schools, parks, and a strong sense of community. It’s ideal for young families and those seeking a quiet retreat from the city.

Description: Modern 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom home in Lakeview with lake access and stunning water views. The home features an open floor plan, floor-to-ceiling windows, and a large deck overlooking the lake. The kitchen includes quartz countertops and a walk-in pantry.
Neighborhood Description: Lakeview is a scenic lakeside community offering boating, fishing, and waterfront dining. With its tranquil setting and recreational opportunities, it’s a favorite for nature lovers and retirees.

Description: Historic charm meets modern convenience in this 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom bungalow in Old Town. Original hardwood floors, exposed brick, and a clawfoot tub add character, while the updated kitchen and HVAC system provide comfort.
Neighborhood Description: Old Town is a vibrant, walkable neighborhood filled with historic homes, art galleries, and local cafes. Its rich history and cultural events make it a popular spot for creatives and professionals.

Description: Spacious 4-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom home in Meadow Ridge with a large backyard and open-concept living area. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances and a breakfast nook. Upstairs, the master suite includes a soaking tub and walk-in closet.
Neighborhood Description: Meadow Ridge is a growing suburban community with excellent schools, new shopping centers, and family-friendly parks. It’s perfect for those seeking a balance of convenience and tranquility.

Description: This well-maintained 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home in Northgate offers a bright and airy layout with vaulted ceilings and a gas fireplace. The kitchen has been updated with granite countertops and new appliances. The backyard includes a covered patio and garden beds.
Neighborhood Description: Northgate is a quiet, established neighborhood with easy access to highways, shopping, and public transit. Known for its safety and community spirit, it’s a great place to raise a family or settle down.
